title: Can't even open LoL(Mac) client after reinstalled
body:
I suddenly cant open the LoL client on my mac, I tried many ways posted on google, and restarted my laptop many times, and it still not working. Then I deleted the whole League of Legends file, and download from website again. After I reinstalled, I clicked the App Icon, it started to download something about 1.5G, after it's done, it disappeared. I clicked the App Icon again, I pop up for 2 sec, and then disappeared. I tried so many times. Same thing happened over and over again. Plz Help Me!!!!!
I tried download from elsewhere as well, none of them worked.

replies.body:
Hey guys, I asked our team about this to try and get more info.  To help us rule out some possibilities, see if updating your OS to the latest version helps.  

Software Update steps:
- Click the Apple icon on the top left of the screen, click on "About This Mac", and choose "Software Update..."
- The App store will open and display any software updates available for OS X and the App Store. OS X updates will be at the top of the list.
- Click "Update All" to install all available software updates. If prompted, enter an admin name and password, then your Apple ID and password
If required, restart your system.

**Update **@ 1:40pm PT - Hey all.  **Updating your OS** seems to resolve the issue for most of these cases.  We'd also like to investigate the issue further as a whole.  It would help a lot to grab some logs from our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We can collect this info and forward it to the proper team to gather more data!

So it is not only me.I thought it was because of the os x.This happened on both PBE and normal client.Send halp :(
When I try to open my client the icon will just bounce on the dock and dissapear (it does this 2 times).It is not the user kernel,only that the LeagueClientUx doesn't work.
Likewise. The same issue with me.
Exact same here too. It feels good not to be alone at least.
Same thing is happening to me. And I don't know what to do.

I have finally solved the problem after unsuccessfully trying everything for hours.
I'm guessing anyone having the same issue is playing on a 10.8 version of the system. I "simply" updated my macbook to High Sierra and it seems to have solved it. My system is so slow now though, which was to be expected.
So far they haven't helped much.

Riot stated the other day that they often don't reply to the boards because not nearly as many people use it as Reddit/Twitter/Facebook. I just uploaded a reddit thread for this. Link: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/7i8ixa/some_mac_players_can_not_open_the_client_on_patch/

EDIT: Took out "I hate to ask for likes, but If everyone could upvote it I'm sure that it will come to Riot's attention faster and we'll all get back on the Rift faster." I found out it's against the subreddit's rules to ask for likes anywhere for any reason and I'd rather the post not get taken down before Riot fixes whatever is causing the problem.

> [{quoted}](name=Siege Ayy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iBEk3w3o,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-12-07T18:33:42.871+0000)
>
> Riot stated the other day that they often don't reply to the boards because not nearly as many people use it as Reddit/Twitter/Facebook. I just uploaded a reddit thread for this. I hate to ask for likes, but If everyone could upvote it I'm sure that it will come to Riot's attention faster and we'll all get back on the Rift faster. Link: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/7i8ixa/some_mac_players_can_not_open_the_client_on_patch/

I hope i will find a solution.I dont want to buy a new PC and lose my account

This is ridiculous, i just upgraded my operating system from 10.7.5 to 10.8.5. I don't want to upgrade to the latest because I have software and plugins for my working software that I don't know if they're compatible with the latest. Also i've heard numerous reports of the computer working really slowly after upgrading. The minimum requirements to play is listed as 10.8.5. This sort of thing happens every other patch leaving me unable to play for weeks until a new patch comes out. I'm sure you guys are looking into it but it doesn't seem right that I'm having to compromise my work setup and upgrade past 4 or 5 OS X versions just to play the game. With the ongoing history of this problem reoccurring, that means I'm gonna have to keep upgrading and that's not ideal for me :/

> [{quoted}](name=CrystalShardz,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iBEk3w3o,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-12-08T17:04:19.574+0000)
>
> This is ridiculous, i just upgraded my operating system from 10.7.5 to 10.8.5. I don't want to upgrade to the latest because I have software and plugins for my working software that I don't know if they're compatible with the latest. Also i've heard numerous reports of the computer working really slowly after upgrading. The minimum requirements to play is listed as 10.8.5. This sort of thing happens every other patch leaving me unable to play for weeks until a new patch comes out. I'm sure you guys are looking into it but it doesn't seem right that I'm having to compromise my work setup and upgrade past 4 or 5 OS X versions just to play the game. With the ongoing history of this problem reoccurring, that means I'm gonna have to keep upgrading and that's not ideal for me :/

So we have to wait for the next patch ? Then no urf and no snow map for us :(
Update to High Sierra, it worked for me!
Same problem for some of us windows users too{{item:3073}}
I don't have any problems on a MacBook Air mid 2012, version 10.12.3. Must be something with older versions.
